Description: Concatenation of 2-digit state FIPS code, 3-digit county FIPS code, and 6-digit census tract number
Census 2010 FIPS State Code (2-digit numeric with leading zeros significant)
Census 2010 FIPS County Code (3-digit numeric with leading zeros significant)
Census 2010 Tract (contains leading zeros with the decimal point implied)
Standard error of life expectancy at birth
Flag to indicate the source of the age-specific death rates used to calculate the abridged, period life tables.
Code: 1 = Observed age-specific death rates for all age groups, 2 = Predicted age-specific death rates for all age groups, 3 = Combination of observed and predicted age-specific death rates
